featured.text: Dead mail is sent to one of the U.S. Postal Service’s dead mail offices in Atlanta, New York, Philadelphia, St. Paul, and San Francisco.
The postal special ________ service is very efficient.

definition.zh_def: 郵政的；與郵件或郵寄相關的
definition.en_def: Relating to the system of sending letters and packages through the mail.
definition.example: She sent the package through the postal service.
